about.title: About Us
about.intro: Welcome to our company. We are dedicated to...

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Have a question or want to get in touch? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

use.title: Acceptable Use
use.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and any activities that occur under your account.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content and materials available through our services are protected by intellectual property rights.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

signIn.title: Sign in to your account
signIn.subtitle: We'll send you a magic link to your email
signIn.success: Check your email for the magic link!
signIn.error: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.
